review: Was easy to setup and came already paired to my Prime account.  The reason it gets 4 stars and not 5 is that when I attached it to my TV and 100 Watt per channel receiver, I didn't know that a demo would start playing and that there is no volume control.  The movie scared my wife and 17 month old son.It is my only device attached to the TV that doesn't have its own volume control so when I switch back and forth, I will need to change the volume on the receiver.

review: Great value and easy setup.  Amazon has a winner here!
author: RNO

review: After having used the Amazon Fire TV Stick for several months now, I can tell you it is one of the easiest and best ways to watch all of your favorite shows any time and almost anywhere! We have cut back on our cable channels (and bill) because there is so much available when you have a Fire stick. We watch Netflix a lot, as well as streaming Amazon videos, music, TV - just about anything you want to see is out there. We LOVE this little device and highly recommend it if you like EASY to use and lots of choices.
author: EJB "Emily"
